title: Turning Twitter (X) Into a Tool: Make Scrolling Worthwhile!
description:
Today we jump into you can transform your daily doom scrolling on X (formerly Twitter) into something genuinely valuable. Exploring the power of AI tools like 'Cursor' and 'Claude' to help build a Chrome extension that curates meaningful content from your daily feeds, allowing you to cut through the noise and find true worth in the endless stream of information.

Check it out: https://leoguinanai.gumroad.com/l/ai-native
